name: Road Runner
overview: Road Runner is a racing-car maze style game not to be confused with the Atari game of the same name featuring the cartoon character. The objective here is to drive around the track avoiding the opposing cars and the obstacles, and passing over the checkpoint flags. These are worth 100, 200, 300 etc. points. The scores increase after passing over the checkpoint flag marked with an "S", and after the tenth checkpoint is reached.
